amendment.description: Manager's amendment, as modified, consists of the text of the amendment contained in House Report 109-540 and printed on pages H4860-H4866 in the Congressional Record for June 29, 2006.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-540 to make a number of technical corrections and to address jurisdictional issues with the Committee on Science and the Committee on Education and the Workforce regarding section 23 of the bill by eliminating a kindergarten through grade 12 education component and by providing an authorization for a Department of Energy research, development and scholarship program.

action.text: Pombo amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. Modification consists of technical corrections on the following pages: page 1, page 21, page 23, page 52, and page 53.
On agreeing to the Pombo amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
